channel.title: Bel Canto Music School - Violin and Piano Lessons in Bristol
channel.description: Bel Canto Music School - Violin and Piano Lessons in Bristol

item.title: Piano and Violin lessons in Bristol
item.description:
Piano and Violin lessons in Bristol

Hello! I have a passion for teaching music and my motivation is in helping you achieve your goal. My approach is to enable and encourage. I can guide you on how to make progress and gain enjoyment from playing an instrument.

item.title: Experience
item.description:
Experience

I have 8 years of experience of teaching piano from beginner level through to grade 8.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Contact

To discuss lessons or ask questions, please contact Monique on 07742651045, or at monique.louisa@icloud.com

item.title: Musical Approach
item.description:
Musical Approach

I hope to make music an important part of my pupils' lives. So I always aim to give my pupils a goal and something to inspire them each lesson. If there is something specific any of my pupils want to ask or know about I always listen and take their views and interests into account. I would say that my approach to lessons is organised yet my teaching also takes place within a flexible frame.

item.title: Ages and levels
item.description:
Ages and levels

I am open to taking pupils from 4-5 years up to any age. Very young beginners follow a special pedagogical programme.

item.title: Charges
item.description:
Charges

I charge £30 for an hour long lesson.

item.title: Accompanying
item.description:
Accompanying

As an accompanist I have worked with my late grandmother who was a singer and instrumentalists including strings and woodwind players.

item.title: Qualifications
item.description:
Qualifications

I have a Licentiate Diploma from the Trinity College London in Piano Teaching.
